DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate clinical radiographic performance G7 Acetabular Cup System .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicentre Observational Study Evaluate Clinical Outcomes G7 Acetabular System
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study evaluate clinical radiographic performance G7 Acetabular Cup System primary revision procedure , report safety survivorship , document instrument ease use .
DOC.criteria: Noninflammatory degenerative joint disease include osteoarthritis avascular necrosis Rheumatoid arthritis Correction functional deformity Treatment nonunion , femoral neck fracture , trochanteric fracture proximal femur head involvement , unmanageable technique Revision procedure treatment device fail 18 year age old Subjects willing return followup evaluation Infection , sepsis osteomyelitis Subjects unable cooperate complete study Neurological condition affect movement Pregnancy
